name: Ervenfell - Crimson Plague v1.1 (No Travel Game Jam)
name_original: Ervenfell - Crimson Plague v1.1 (No Travel Game Jam)
description:
Hi.

I'm Dejan P. Blažević, but most people just call me by my nickname, Ryu.

This game contains some content from my fantasy book (Ervenfell - The Alteration).

I made this short and rather fast game in 12 days (124 hrs says steam) for the No Travel Game Jam 2020.

I hope you enjoy a quick jump into my fantasy world

Synopsis:

In Ervenfell - Crimson Plague you play as Zara, a young Lighelf girl from Planin village, who is a novice healer/priestess of Myla [Goddess of Mercy].

Things prove to be a bit difficult when a sickness, a plague, suddenly appears and threatens to spread all across of Ervenfell.

Characters:

Main:

Zara: A young Lightelf, the main character

Myla: The Goddess of Mercy

The Order of Spellswords: A powerful group of abomination slayers visiting Planin village [Koib, Nami, Mave, Zirah, Iyo, Azra and Ryu (self insert confirmed xD)].

Other:

Many villagers, shop keepers and travelers at the inn.

Features:

-Playtime- is up to players. By skipping (fast forwarding) text and following the quests it will take up to 40min to complete the game, or you could just walk out of the city and get a game over screen.

-Books- ,all the books. If you feel like reading some more about the world of Ervenfell, you can do so in-game (or buy my book on amazon , even better).

-Choices- in this game matter, most of the time.

-No- cursed random encounters by walking around.

-Story- driven, battles are quick and easy to complete.

-Hopefully- you .

Excuses:

I love the default rpg maker tilesets, always did, and I'm not an artist, but I will admit I would have done more and better, had I not started off so late barely made it in time as is (tell me if you find any bug/glitch/something that shouldn't happen, so I can correct it).




"Your home"

End:

Thank you for reading and enjoy the game :)
